ImageSource.Tag Class Reference

The Tag class hold all information about a particular tag which has been applied to an image. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 Tag (TagType type, object val)
 Tag (TagType type, object val)
 Create a new Tag object with the specified TagType and value.
override string ToString ()
 Returns the tagValue of the Tag.

Properties

object tagValue [get, set]
 Gets and sets the value of the tag. The type of tagValue must be the same as the type specified by tagType.dataType.
TagType tagType [get, set]
 Gets or sets the TagType of the Tag. When tagType is set, the tagValue is automatically set to null.

Detailed Description

The Tag class hold all information about a particular tag which has been applied to an image.

object  val

Create a new Tag object with the specified TagType and value.

Member Function Documentation

Returns the tagValue of the Tag.

Returns:
The tagValue of the Tag

Property Documentation

TagType ImageSource.Tag::tagType [get, set]

Gets or sets the TagType of the Tag. When tagType is set, the tagValue is automatically set to null.

object ImageSource.Tag::tagValue [get, set]

Gets and sets the value of the tag. The type of tagValue must be the same as the type specified by tagType.dataType.
